```{r}
#make a vector for the labels to manipute 

COI_labelc <-read.FASTA("C:/witteLab/Fasta_files/COI_sciaenops_ocellatus.fasta.treefile")
```



```{r}
library(stringr)

fasta_names <- names(COI_labelc)

mapping_df <- data.frame(
  full_label = fasta_names
) %>%
  mutate(
    accession = word(full_label, 1),
    genus = word(full_label, 2),
    species = word(full_label, 3),
    genus_species = paste(genus, species)
  )


```
